// About activity SleepyWifi Info License Author This Android app brings back the \'turn wifi off when the phone is in sleepmode\' option for Android 8.1. After you have opened the app the apps service runs in the background. SleepyWifi is licensed under GPL-3.0 or later. SleepyWifi is developed by Devluuk
